meanings.definition: To look at carefully in search of flaws
meanings.sent1: I will inspect the toy for any broken parts.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic will inspect the car before selling it.
meanings.sent3: The detective decided to inspect the crime scene with a magnifying glass.
meanings.sent4: She inspected the painting closely, searching for any imperfections.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to inspect their work for any mistakes before submitting it.

meanings.sent1: The health inspector will inspect the restaurant for cleanliness.
meanings.sent2: The government will inspect the building for safety regulations.
meanings.sent3: The inspector decided to inspect the documents thoroughly before approving them.
meanings.sent4: The auditor will inspect the financial records to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent5: The referee will inspect the players' equipment before the game starts.
